name: Sanity CMS
description: Integrate with Sanity CMS to query, create, patch and more.
author: agenticmail

tools.name: Query
tools.description: Execute a GROQ query against a Sanity dataset. Returns matching documents. GROQ is Sanity's query language (e.g. *[_type == "post"]{title, slug}).

tools.name: Create Document
tools.description: Create a new document in a Sanity dataset. Provide the document type and fields.

tools.name: Patch Document
tools.description: Patch (update) an existing document in a Sanity dataset. Supports set, unset, and inc operations.

tools.name: Delete Document
tools.description: Delete a document from a Sanity dataset by ID.

tools.name: List Datasets
tools.description: List all datasets in the Sanity project. Returns dataset names and visibility settings.
